name: ostd::arch::iommu::interrupt_remapping::table::SourceValidationType
doc_adt: The type of validation that must be performed by the interrupt-remapping hardware.

VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).name: RequesterId
VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).doc:
Verify requester-id in the interrupt request using the SID and SQ fields in the
 IRTE.

VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).name: RequesterBus
VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).doc:
Verify the most significant 8 bits of the requester-id (Bus#) in the interrupt
 request are equal to or within the Startbus# and EndBus# specified through the
 upper and lower 8 bits of the SID field respectively.
